016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.xml.XmlMapper;
020import io.micronaut.maven.RunMojo;
021import org.apache.maven.AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant;
022import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
023import org.apache.maven.model.Build;
024import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
025import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator;
027import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
028import org.codehaus.plexus.component.annotations.Component;
029import org.codehaus.plexus.component.configurator.expression.ExpressionEvaluationException;
030import org.codehaus.plexus.component.configurator.expression.ExpressionEvaluator;
031import org.codehaus.plexus.logging.Logger;
032import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
033import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3DomWriter;
034import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
035
036import javax.inject.Inject;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.io.StringWriter;
039import java.io.Writer;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.Map;
042import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
043import java.util.function.Consumer;
044
045import static io.micronaut.maven.RunMojo.THIS_PLUGIN;
046import static io.micronaut.maven.testresources.AbstractTestResourcesMojo.CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX;
047import static io.micronaut.maven.testresources.StopTestResourcesServerMojo.MICRONAUT_TEST_RESOURCES_KEEPALIVE;
048
049/**
050 * A lifecycle extension which determines if the test resources server should
051 * be stopped when the build is complete.
052 */
053@Component(role = AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant.class, hint = "test-resources")
054public class TestResourcesLifecycleExtension extends AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant  {
055
056    private static final String EXPLICIT_START_SERVICE_GOAL_NAME = "mn:" + StartTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME;
057    private static final String EXPLICIT_STOP_SERVICE_GOAL_NAME = "mn:" + StopTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME;
058
059    private final Map<MavenProject, ExpressionEvaluator> perProjectEvaluator = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
060    private final Map<MavenProject, TestResourcesConfiguration> perProjectConfiguration = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
061
062    private final Logger logger;
063    private final XmlMapper mapper;
064
065    @Inject
066    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
067    public TestResourcesLifecycleExtension(Logger logger, XmlMapper mapper) {
068        this.logger = logger;
069        this.mapper = mapper;
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public void afterProjectsRead(MavenSession session) {
074        session.getAllProjects().forEach(currentProject -> {
075            Build build = currentProject.getBuild();
076            withPlugin(build, plugin -> {
077                ExpressionEvaluator evaluator = perProjectEvaluator.computeIfAbsent(currentProject, p -> initEvaluator(p, session));
078                TestResourcesConfiguration configuration = perProjectConfiguration.computeIfAbsent(currentProject, mavenProject -> initConfiguration(plugin));
079
080                boolean enabled = isEnabled(evaluator, configuration);
081                if (enabled) {
082                    List<String> goals = session.getGoals();
083                    if (goals.stream().anyMatch(EXPLICIT_START_SERVICE_GOAL_NAME::equals)) {
084                        // we need to keep the server alive at the end of the build
085
086                        Xpp3Dom flag = new Xpp3Dom(MICRONAUT_TEST_RESOURCES_KEEPALIVE);
087                        Xpp3Dom pluginConfiguration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
088                        pluginConfiguration.addChild(flag);
089                        flag.setValue("true");
090                    }
091                }
092            });
093        });
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public void afterSessionEnd(MavenSession session) {
098        if (session.getGoals().stream().noneMatch(s -> s.equals(EXPLICIT_START_SERVICE_GOAL_NAME) || s.equals(EXPLICIT_STOP_SERVICE_GOAL_NAME))) {
099            session.getAllProjects().forEach(currentProject -> {
100                Build build = currentProject.getBuild();
101                withPlugin(build, plugin -> {
102                    ExpressionEvaluator evaluator = perProjectEvaluator.computeIfAbsent(currentProject, p -> initEvaluator(p, session));
103                    TestResourcesConfiguration configuration = perProjectConfiguration.computeIfAbsent(currentProject, mavenProject -> initConfiguration(plugin));
104                    boolean enabled = isEnabled(evaluator, configuration);
105                    boolean keepAlive = isKeepAlive(evaluator, configuration);
106                    boolean shared = isShared(evaluator, configuration);
107                    File buildDirectory = new File(build.getDirectory());
108
109                    TestResourcesHelper helper = new TestResourcesHelper(enabled, keepAlive, shared, buildDirectory);
110                    if (shared) {
111                        String sharedServerNamespace = findSharedServerNamespace(evaluator, configuration);
112                        helper.setSharedServerNamespace(sharedServerNamespace);
113                    }
114                    try {
115                        helper.stop();
116                    } catch (Exception e) {
117                        logger.error(e.getMessage(), e);
118                    }
119                });
120            });
121        }
122    }
123
124    private String findSharedServerNamespace(ExpressionEvaluator evaluator, TestResourcesConfiguration configuration) {
125        try {
126            String result = (String) evaluator.evaluate("${" + CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "namespace" + "}");
127            if (result != null) {
128                return result;
129            } else if (configuration != null) {
130                return configuration.getSharedServerNamespace();
131            }
132        } catch (ExpressionEvaluationException e) {
133            return null;
134        }
135        return null;
136    }
137
138    private boolean isShared(ExpressionEvaluator evaluator, TestResourcesConfiguration configuration) {
139        Boolean result = evaluateBooleanProperty(evaluator, CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "shared");
140        if (result != null) {
141            return result;
142        } else if (configuration != null) {
143            return configuration.isShared();
144        }
145        return false;
146    }
147
148    private boolean isKeepAlive(ExpressionEvaluator evaluator, TestResourcesConfiguration configuration) {
149        Boolean result = evaluateBooleanProperty(evaluator, MICRONAUT_TEST_RESOURCES_KEEPALIVE);
150        if (result != null) {
151            return result;
152        } else if (configuration != null) {
153            return configuration.isKeepAlive();
154        }
155        return false;
156    }
157
158    private boolean isEnabled(ExpressionEvaluator evaluator, TestResourcesConfiguration configuration) {
159        Boolean result = evaluateBooleanProperty(evaluator, CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "enabled");
160        if (result != null) {
161            return result;
162        } else if (configuration != null) {
163            return configuration.isTestResourcesEnabled();
164        }
165        return false;
166    }
167
168    private TestResourcesConfiguration initConfiguration(Plugin plugin) {
169        Xpp3Dom configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
170        if (configuration == null) {
171            configuration = MojoExecutor.configuration();
172            plugin.setConfiguration(configuration);
173        }
174        Writer writer = new StringWriter();
175        Xpp3DomWriter.write(writer, configuration);
176        try {
177            return mapper.readValue(writer.toString(), TestResourcesConfiguration.class);
178        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
179            logger.error(e.getMessage(), e);
180            return new TestResourcesConfiguration();
181        }
182    }
183
184    private Boolean evaluateBooleanProperty(ExpressionEvaluator evaluator, String property) {
185        try {
186            Object result = evaluator.evaluate("${" + property + "}");
187            if (result instanceof Boolean b) {
188                return b;
189            } else if (result instanceof String s && (s.equals(Boolean.TRUE.toString()) || s.equals(Boolean.FALSE.toString()))) {
190                return Boolean.parseBoolean(s);
191            }
192        } catch (ExpressionEvaluationException e) {
193            return false;
194        }
195        return null;
196    }
197
198    private ExpressionEvaluator initEvaluator(MavenProject currentProject, MavenSession session) {
199        Plugin thisPlugin = currentProject.getPlugin(THIS_PLUGIN);
200        MojoExecution execution = new MojoExecution(thisPlugin, null, null);
201        MavenProject actualCurrentProject = session.getCurrentProject();
202        ExpressionEvaluator evaluator;
203
204        // Maven 3: PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator gets the current project from the session:
205        // synchronize in case another thread wants to fetch the real current project in between
206        synchronized (perProjectEvaluator) {
207            session.setCurrentProject(currentProject);
208            evaluator = new PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator(session, execution);
209            session.setCurrentProject(actualCurrentProject);
210        }
211
212        return evaluator;
213    }
214
215    private static void withPlugin(Build build, Consumer<? super Plugin> consumer) {
216        build.getPlugins()
217                .stream()
218                .filter(p -> RunMojo.THIS_PLUGIN.equals(p.getGroupId() + ":" + p.getArtifactId()))
219                .findFirst()
220                .ifPresent(consumer);
221    }
222}
